question:
Consider the following statements about the India-based Neutrino Observatory (INO) Project:
  1. It is joint initiative of Department of Atomic Energy (DAE) and Department of Science & Technology (DST)
  2. The Observatory is proposed to be set up at Theni district in Tamil Nadu 
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
India-based Neutrino Observatory (INO) Project is joint initiative of Department of Atomic Energy (DAE) and Department of Science & Technology (DST). The project is proposed to be set up in the Bodi West Hills of Theni district in Tamil Nadu.
